attributes.action: Recall Parliament: National unity Government for Coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details:
COVID-19 has brought about an unprecedented international crisis. It is estimated that currently a 1000 people are dying in the U.K. every day. If this rate continues we may be on course for the highest death rate in Europe. 

The UK needs all hands, and heads, to the pump, to steer us through this crisis. 

Failure to do so will show us the electorate that political Parties are only interested in power.
attributes.background: An immediate recall of Parliament and for Parliament to agree a unity Government to continue without further adjournment until such time the crisis is over
